title: Add print-on-demand availability line to Zayora landing page hero

requirements.summary: Add a prominent, stylistically consistent hero-area information line stating that print-on-demand service is available, without altering existing required texts.
acceptanceCriteria: The page displays an additional line of text that communicates "Print on demand available" (or equivalent correct English phrasing).
The new information is visible on initial page load without requiring navigation to another page.
Existing required texts remain present and unchanged: "Men's Clothing Store", "Founder: Yash Jaiswal", main contact number "9919031636", and ordering number "9919031626".
The new line matches the existing site styling (typography/colors/spacing) and does not introduce a new theme.

file_operations.description: Within the Hero Section text block, add one additional English information line such as "Print on demand available" in a visually prominent but consistent placement (e.g., between the existing hero description and the "Order Now" call-to-action, or immediately below the CTA), ensuring the existing required texts and phone numbers remain present and unchanged and that no new pages or backend dependencies are introduced.
